content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Maryam. How about we start with 750 Euros per month? It's a fair price considering the central location and the amenities nearby.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can get a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Maryam. How about 730 Euros per month? It's a great apartment, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can get a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Maryam, I think 720 Euros per month is a reasonable price. I can offer no deposit, but a one-year lease term.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can get a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Maryam, I'm sorry but I think 710 Euros per month is the lowest I can go. It's a great apartment, and I'm sure you'll appreciate the location.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can get a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Maryam, I think 700 Euros per month is the best I can offer. I hope you consider it.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I can get a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
